title: How to write the date in Spanish on a letter - Quora

response.answer_text: When writing the date in spanish write the day first, then the month, and then the year. For example: English: February 29, 1996 Español: El 29 de febrero de 1996 You could also write it like: English: 2/29/96 Español: 29.2.96 However, the first one is more formal for a letter.
